column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Have been to Bavette's twice now and had a fantastic evening both times. The most recent was for my girlfriend's birthday where the restaurant and Erika went above and beyond for it by bringing out a delightful wedge salad and ice cream dessert that were both covered. Fantastic ambiance for any occasion (night out with some guy friends or just the gf) that will impress. I haven't been able to get my steak cooked perfectly to my standard medium rare liking yet
column2: but believe it's mostly circumstantial and also partly my fault for over correcting my order. The shrimp app is fantastic and the elote corn and mac & cheese are great meal accompaniments. Wine policy makes it easy to save a couple bucks
column3: but will likely encourage you to order extra food to enjoy. I will always suggest this place for most occasions
